scripts.start: NODE_ENV=DEVELOPMENT TZ=utc nodemon --ignore dist/ src/bin/index.js --exec 'prettier --write "**/*.@(js|json|graphql)" && rimraf dist && babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/schema.graphql dist/ && copyfiles .env dist/ && NODE_ENV=DEVELOPMENT TZ=utc node dist/bin'
scripts.start:prod: rimraf dist && babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/schema.graphql dist/ && copyfiles .env dist/ && NODE_ENV=PRODUCTION TZ=utc node dist/bin
